body:
Comment 31 by **jz4082**: 
For those that are interested, I ended up doing a bit of virtualBox tweaking and was
able to get my execution time down to 5s, rather than the 51s in my initial comments. 

I allocated a smaller amount of RAM (1 gig), and that seemed to speed improve
performance markedly.  I originally had 2 gigs allocated, out of a total of 4 gigs of
RAM on my host machine.  

This seems to suggest that vbox settings were a primary cause of the slowdown and not a
bug in golang code.
